___appSettings.description: This is for custom application specific settings in a hashmap structure (key/value) pairs.

___hiddenCols.description: Hidden alignment column ranges in comma delimited string i.e [2-5, 9-9, 11-12]

___version.description: Version of the application which generated the JSON

___showSeqFeatures.description: Determines if sequence features are visible or not

___globalColorScheme.description: The Global colour scheme applied to all the sequences within the alignment

___webStartUrl.description: Jalview specific setting which points to the url for launching Jalview

___application.description: The name of the application which generated the Json

___svid.description: Serial version id for the SeqFeature object

___sequenceRef.description: Reference to the Sequence in the alignment (More like a foreign key)

___xStart.description: Start residue position for the sequence feature

___xEnd.description: End residue position for the sequence feature

___svid.description: Serial version identifier for the seqGroup object model

___displayBoxes.description: Determines if the seqGroup border should be visible or not

___showNonconserved.description: Determines if non conserved regions of a group is shown or not

___colourScheme.description: The Colour Scheme applied to the Sequence Group

___displayText.description: Determines if the texts of the group is displayed or not

___seqsHash.description: An array of the unique id's for the sequences belonging to the group

___startRes.description: The index of the group’s first residue in the alignment space

___colourText.description: Determines if the Residues text for the group is coloured

___endRes.description: The index of the group’s last residue in the alignment space

___groupName.description: The name assigned to the seqGroup

___svid.description: Serial version id for the alignAnnotation object model

___secondaryStructure.description: Secondary structure symbol for the given annotation

___displayCharacter.description: Display character which denotes the given annotation

___seqs.description: An array of Sequences which makes up the Alignment

___svid.description: Serial version identifier for the seqs object model

___order.description: The order/position of a sequence in the alignment space

___start.description: The index of the sequence’s first residue in it’s source database

___id.description: Unique identifier for a given Sequence

___end.description: The index of the sequence’s last residue in it’s source database
